title: needcreations
author: needcreations
content: I created a standard deck of 52 playing cards + 2 jokers all Bitcoin themed. Bitcoiners are loving them and they're a great orange-pilling tool for poker night! Here's a link with pictures and feedback from customers: https://twitter.com/NEEDcreations/status/1626646307145191427?s=20If you'd like to save money and buy with bitcoin directly from me, let me know here or message me on Twitter @needcreations. Or you can buy from Ebay or Amazon with fiat.Ebay: https://www.ebay.com/itm/266054608846Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BSHD7G9X?ref=myi_title_dpI put a lot of love and research into these cards. I've always wanted to create something like this and I'm happy with the result. If you have any questions, let me know.Feel free to send me an email if you're more comfortable communicating that way: needcreations@gmail.com

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Looks pretty cool and interesting.  Do you accept Bitcoin for this? If so please do say so and if you accept escrow as well here.  Do you have anymore pics of the rest of the cards? You did say 52 correct?  Good luck with your sales!

comments.author: needcreations
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on February 23, 2023, 08:48:27 PM  Looks pretty cool and interesting.  Do you accept Bitcoin for this? If so please do say so and if you accept escrow as well here.  Do you have anymore pics of the rest of the cards? You did say 52 correct?  Good luck with your sales!I do accept Bitcoin. I'm not familiar with an escrow service we could use, maybe you can explain that to me? Yes, 52 cards (just like a normal playing cards deck) plus 2 jokers (all Bitcoin themed). And if you scroll through the replies of this link you can find many more pictures. https://twitter.com/NEEDcreations/status/1626646307145191427?s=20

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: needcreations on February 23, 2023, 09:24:50 PMQuote from: krogothmanhattan on February 23, 2023, 08:48:27 PM  Looks pretty cool and interesting.  Do you accept Bitcoin for this? If so please do say so and if you accept escrow as well here.  Do you have anymore pics of the rest of the cards? You did say 52 correct?  Good luck with your sales!I do accept Bitcoin. I'm not familiar with an escrow service we could use, maybe you can explain that to me? Yes, 52 cards (just like a normal playing cards deck) plus 2 jokers (all Bitcoin themed). And if you scroll through the replies of this link you can find many more pictures. https://twitter.com/NEEDcreations/status/1626646307145191427?s=20 Yes I will of course....There are escrow people here like MinerJones.      So the buyer sends the BTC to MinerJones ...Once received he will inform the Seller. The seller sends the item to the buyer.     Once the buyer receives the item in good standing MinerJones sends the Bitcoin to the seller     You can click on the trust of say MinerJones and see all the feedback he has received as a seller and also as an escrow     https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=346731

comments.author: pinky1234
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on February 23, 2023, 09:31:52 PMQuote from: needcreations on February 23, 2023, 09:24:50 PMQuote from: krogothmanhattan on February 23, 2023, 08:48:27 PM  Looks pretty cool and interesting.  Do you accept Bitcoin for this? If so please do say so and if you accept escrow as well here.  Do you have anymore pics of the rest of the cards? You did say 52 correct?  Good luck with your sales!I do accept Bitcoin. I'm not familiar with an escrow service we could use, maybe you can explain that to me? Yes, 52 cards (just like a normal playing cards deck) plus 2 jokers (all Bitcoin themed). And if you scroll through the replies of this link you can find many more pictures. https://twitter.com/NEEDcreations/status/1626646307145191427?s=20 Yes I will of course....There are escrow people here like MinerJones.      So the buyer sends the BTC to MinerJones ...Once received he will inform the Seller. The seller sends the item to the buyer.     Once the buyer receives the item in good standing MinerJones sends the Bitcoin to the seller     You can click on the trust of say MinerJones and see all the feedback he has received as a seller and also as an escrow     https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=346731@ krogothmanhattan & Others members here , I can Confirm This guy  is legit .  I Pm him via Twitter  so he can post this here .  Already purchase my set from him .  Nice cards to giveaway at conference , Family Members .etc  . Twitter : @NEEDcreations

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: I can also verify that Needcreations is legit. I have been following him on Twitter for awhile, he's a dedicated Bitcoiner.

comments.author: av8rjeff
comments.body: NEEDcreations, are you associated with Satoshi's Journal?  I was just checking out that project and I really dig what is going on over there.

comments.author: tweetious
comments.created_time: February 23, 2023, 10:15:55 PMLast edit: February 23, 2023, 10:59:07 PM by tweetious
comments.body: I can also confirm that:I bought my deck of cards directly from the twitter user @NEEDcreations I paid in BTC and received the cards in good standing.

comments.author: needcreations
comments.body: Quote from: av8rjeff on February 23, 2023, 10:07:57 PMNEEDcreations, are you associated with Satoshi's Journal?  I was just checking out that project and I really dig what is going on over there.Hey! Yes! I've been with Satoshi's Journal for almost a year now. I love what we're building. If you have any questions about us don't hesitate to shoot me a message! We've got a big announcement coming up soon so stay tuned for that @satoshisjournal www.satoshisjournal.com

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: I also bought and received a set - I left them sealed for now though.

comments.author: raritycheck
comments.body: Good initiative. Thank you for this.

comments.author: needcreations
comments.body: Thank you! If you'd like a deck please send me a dm

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Mine was scheduled to arrive today but of course USPS found an issue when attempting delivery!   So will have to wait until tomorrow...they didn't even leave a note!

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.created_time: March 02, 2023, 10:14:05 PMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 04:59:24 PM by krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Cards arrived and I just do not have the heart to open the package up...so going to leave   closed for my collection. But from what I can see from the card in the back on the photo, it looks    pretty interesting and agree with what it says! I can only imagine what the rest of the back hodls inside!    ""Avoid all shitcoins at all costs! "   Good job mate!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: You can open it - its not sealed so can easily reclose - at least mine was not sealed - is yours?

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on March 02, 2023, 11:45:52 PMYou can open it - its not sealed so can easily reclose - at least mine was not sealed - is yours?   I checked and yes you can and also take them out of the plastic wrappers, but I will leave intact regardless.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on March 03, 2023, 08:01:49 AMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on March 02, 2023, 11:45:52 PMYou can open it - its not sealed so can easily reclose - at least mine was not sealed - is yours?   I checked and yes you can and also take them out of the plastic wrappers, but I will leave intact regardless.that is why I usually try to get 2, one to keep sealed one to open

comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on March 03, 2023, 04:39:55 PMQuote from: krogothmanhattan on March 03, 2023, 08:01:49 AMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on March 02, 2023, 11:45:52 PMYou can open it - its not sealed so can easily reclose - at least mine was not sealed - is yours?   I checked and yes you can and also take them out of the plastic wrappers, but I will leave intact regardless.that is why I usually try to get 2, one to keep sealed one to open   Good idea indeed...I wish I had the extra room and the extra korn    Maybe someday will buy an extra set.

comments.body: I had to break open a set, and I'm glad I did.  Here's some pix.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: av8rjeff on March 04, 2023, 06:45:34 PMI had to break open a set, and I'm glad I did.  Here's some pix.*************   Thanks for doing that...good to see what is inside my packet of cards without having to open it up      They look as good as I imagined them to be for sure!
